alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Chatham; Durham; Granville; Lee; Orange; Person; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 1:01PM EDT until July 09 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ALAMANCE...PERSON...ORANGE...GRANVILLE... NORTHWESTERN LEE...NORTHWESTERN WAKE...DURHAM AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 100 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Virgilina to near Carrboro to near Goldston to 11 miles west of Sanford, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Chapel Hill, Oxford, Roxboro, Hillsborough, Creedmoor, Pittsboro and Siler City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.

area.areaDesc: Alamance; Chatham; Durham; Granville; Lee; Orange; Person; Wake
